title: Neuronetics gets FDA clearance for NeuroStar add-on in OCD
author: Phil Taylor
description: Transcranial magnetic stimulation pioneer Neuronetics has picked up a new FDA clearance that builds its position in obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD), a major new application of the technology.
